Literature.Title: Machine learning and genetic algorithm-guided directed evolution for the development of antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Zhang H, Wang Y, Zhu Y, Huang P, Gao Q, Li X, Chen Z, Liu Y, Jiang J, Gao Y, Huang J, Qin Z

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=>40µM),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=>40µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens CGMCC 1.3202(MIC=1.25-2.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.2421(MIC=10-20µM),Shigella flexneri CGMCC 1.1868(MIC=1.25-2.5µM),Aeromonas hydrophila CGMCC 1.2017(MIC=>40µM),Staphylococcus aureus CGMCC 1.2465(MIC=>40µM),Bacillus subtilis CGMCC 1.3358(MIC=<1.25µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum CGMCC 1.1886(MIC=<1.25µM)
